goals__remit: Ajinomoto is originally a Japan based company, leader in the development of amino acid technology. Ajinomoto's aim is to contribute to significant advances in food and health. Ajinomoto main sectors of activity are:  food and feed, amino science and health. In Europe Ajinomoto has facilities producing food products, feed ingredients, food supplements and pharma grade products. The regional head office for EMEA region is located in Paris
